name: Block-O
description:
Welcome To Block-O

Welcome to Block-o A Game by DutchDeveloper

What is Block-O?

Block-o is a Puzzle-Game where you need to get to the goal.

How do i Play?

1. Download The File.

2. Extract it

3. click on the Block-o.Exe File

4. Click on Level Selector or Play!

5. Use W.A.S.D keys or your arrow keys.

6 have fun!

How do i report bugs?

make a video or screens-shot and send me it with Twitter: @DutchDevelop
